description: Provides an OBS bucket object resource.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Acl.description: The ACL policy to apply. Defaults to `private`.

Bucket.description: The name of the bucket to put the file in.

Content.description: The literal content being uploaded to the bucket.

ContentType.description:
A standard MIME type describing the format of the object data, e.g. application/octet-stream.
All Valid MIME Types are valid for this input.

Encryption.description: Whether enable server-side encryption of the object in SSE-KMS mode.

Etag.description:
Specifies the unique identifier of the object content. It can be used to trigger updates.
The only meaningful value is `md5(file("path_to_file"))`.

Key.description: The name of the object once it is in the bucket.

Source.description: The path to the source file being uploaded to the bucket.

StorageClass.description: Specifies the storage class of the object. Defaults to `STANDARD`.
